topic.title: Additional Supplied Programs
topic.shortdesc: Additional programs available in the Greenplum Database installation.

body.p: The following PostgreSQL contrib server utility programs are installed:

ul.li: pg_upgrade - Server program to upgrade a Greenplum Database server instance.pg_upgrade is not intended for direct use with Greenplum 6, but will be used by Greenplum upgrade utilities in a future release.
pg_xlogdump - Server utility program to display a human-readable rendering of the write-ahead log of a Greenplum Database cluster.
